statements: UPDATE InfluencerMarketingROI SET total_cost = 1000.50, cost_per_engagement = 5.25 WHERE influencer_id = 1
UPDATE InfluencerMarketingROI SET influencer_name = 'John Doe', engagement_count = 1500 WHERE influencer_id = 2
UPDATE InfluencerMarketingROI SET total_cost = total_cost + 5000, cost_per_engagement = total_cost / engagement_count WHERE influencer_id = 101
UPDATE InfluencerMarketingROI SET engagement_count = 250, cost_per_engagement = total_cost / 250 WHERE influencer_id = 102
UPDATE Influencers SET followers = 5000, engagement_rate = 7.5 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe'
